projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio built with React and TailwindCSS. Yes this site, i count it as a project.

projects.title: Gravebound
projects.description: Gravebound is a 3D game made by 3 people including me in Godot for the school competition SCI++, we didn't win, but we got a distinction from 'Frabryka Gier' a company which makes games.
